Name: Sweet Potato (PH)
Description: This sweet tuber's leaves and young shoots are sometimes eaten as greens. It's a distant relative of the potato.

DescriptionLocalization.es: This sweet tuber's leaves and young shoots are sometimes eaten as greens. It's a distant relative of the potato.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: This sweet tuber's leaves and young shoots are sometimes eaten as greens. It's a distant relative of the potato.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Die Blätter und jungen Triebe dieser süßen Knolle werden manchmal als Blattgemüse gegessen. Sie ist ein entfernter Verwandter der Kartoffel.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: This sweet tuber's leaves and young shoots are sometimes eaten as greens. It's a distant relative of the potato.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: This sweet tuber's leaves and young shoots are sometimes eaten as greens. It's a distant relative of the potato.
DescriptionLocalization.it: This sweet tuber's leaves and young shoots are sometimes eaten as greens. It's a distant relative of the potato.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: This sweet tuber's leaves and young shoots are sometimes eaten as greens. It's a distant relative of the potato.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: This sweet tuber's leaves and young shoots are sometimes eaten as greens. It's a distant relative of the potato.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Иногда листочки и молодые побеги этого сладкого клубня едят как зелень. Это дальний родственник картофеля.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: This sweet tuber's leaves and young shoots are sometimes eaten as greens. It's a distant relative of the potato.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 红薯的叶子和嫩芽有时作为绿色蔬菜食用。它是马铃薯的远亲。
